response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item is not just any commodity; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. Given its unique features and high-quality standards, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. Considering its rarity and the benefits it offers, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you. Would you be interested in acquiring this product at a special introductory price of $18,000? This is an opportunity to secure a remarkable asset at a premium rate before it's available to the general market. Let me know if you'd like to discuss further.", "product_price": 18000}
